response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that could potentially enrich your life in ways we both can only imagine. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. I believe this offer reflects the true worth while providing you with an exceptional value. I look forward to discussing how this product could become an integral part of your collection or endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
